ServiceInterface.description: The AwProjectLevelSecurity service exposes operations used to manage Teamcenter Authorization Projects from Active Workspace. These operations allow the client to create and update a Teamcenter Authorization Project.
ServiceInterface.name: AwProjectLevelSecurity

Struct.description: A strucure that contains information related to Ace Context.
Struct.name: ConfigurationContextChoice

StructElement.description: Internal value of business object.
StructElement.name: internalValue

StructElement.description: Display value of business object.
StructElement.name: displayValue

StructElement.description: If true, this instance of ConfigurationContextChoice should be set as default choice.
StructElement.name: isDefaultValue

Struct.description: A structure containing license related information to filter licenses.
Struct.name: FilterInfo

StructElement.description: The type of ADA licenses to be filtered.
StructElement.name: licenseType

StructElement.description: The ID of the license to be filtered.
StructElement.name: licenseId

Struct.description: Structure that holds the information required to get list of licenses.
Struct.name: LicenseInput

StructElement.description: The list of selected WorkspaceObject objects
StructElement.name: selectedObjects

StructElement.description: The list of licenses (ADA_License) which are already selected to attach with objects.
StructElement.name: selectedLicenses

StructElement.description: The filter criteria based on license type and license ID.
StructElement.name: filterInfo

StructElement.description: The pagination criteria.
StructElement.name: paginationInfo

StructElement.description: If true, the user is in ActiveWorkspace Content context.
StructElement.name: isAceContext

StructElement.description: If true only already attached licenses to objects will return in response. If false than attached and available both licenses will return in response.
StructElement.name: isAssigned

StructElement.description: A list of parameters for future use.
StructElement.name: licenseParamsIn

Typedef.description: A map (string, list of ConfigurationContextChoice) of ACE context atrributes with the list of ACE context atrtributes and possible values.
Typedef.name: LicenseOptions

Struct.description: Structure that holds the licenses object.
Struct.name: LicenseOutput

StructElement.description: A list of ADA_License objects which are assigned to the seletectd InputObect. If the InputObject is a single select, ead_paragraph will be include. If the InputObject is a multi-select, ead_paragraph will be blank.
StructElement.name: commonAssignedLicenseList

StructElement.description: A list of ADA_License objects which are available to attach to the selected InputObject.
StructElement.name: availableLicenseList

StructElement.description: List of all licenses already selected for attach to selected objects.
StructElement.name: allAssignedLicenseList

StructElement.description: A list of types of the assignedLicenseList.
StructElement.name: assignedLicenseTypes

StructElement.description: A list of types of the availableLicenseList.
StructElement.name: availableLicenseTypes

Typedef.description: A map (string, list of string) for future use. It will used to return values which passed in licenseParamsIn parameter of LicenseInputs structure.
Typedef.name: LicenseParamsOut

Struct.description: A strucure that holds all license related and pagination related information.
Struct.name: LicensesWithTypesResponse

StructElement.description: A list of licenseOutputs objects.
StructElement.name: licensesOutput

StructElement.description: A map (string, list of ConfigurationContextChoice) of ACE context atrributes with the list of ACE context atrtributes and possible values.
StructElement.name: licenseOptions

StructElement.description: The total licenses found.
StructElement.name: totalFound

StructElement.description: The end index of the ADA_LICENSE returned by the operation. This end index will be used by the client as start index of next iteration.
StructElement.name: endIndex

StructElement.description: The total number of licenses loaded at a time.
StructElement.name: totalLoaded

StructElement.description: A map (string, list of string) for future use. It will used to return values which passed in licenseParamsIn parameter of LicenseInputs structure.
StructElement.name: licenseParamsOut

StructElement.description: The SOA framework object containing objects that were created, deleted or updated by the Service, plain objects and error information. For this service, all object are returned to the plain objects group. Error information will also be returned.
StructElement.name: serviceData

Struct.description: structure that holds internal value and display value of ADA_License.
Struct.name: LicenseType

StructElement.description: Internal value of ADA_License.
StructElement.name: internalValue

StructElement.description: Display value of ADA_License.
StructElement.name: displayValue

StructElement.description: The start index to return the licenses. Must be a non-negative value. Otherwise all data will be returned and the data will not be paginated.
StructElement.name: startIndex

StructElement.description: The maximum number of licenses to return. Must be a value greater than zero. Otherwise, all data will be returned and the data will not be paginated.
StructElement.name: maxToReturn

Struct.description: Structure that holds the information required to create a Teamcenter Authorization project.
Struct.name: CreateProjectInfo

StructElement.description: Unique identifier for the project.
StructElement.name: projectId

StructElement.description: Unique name for the project.
StructElement.name: projectName

StructElement.description: Describes the project.
StructElement.name: projectDescription

StructElement.description: True if the project uses program level security.
StructElement.name: useProgramSecurity

StructElement.description: Empty or specifies a valid project category. Valid project categories are defined in the Fnd0ProjectCategories list of values.
StructElement.name: projectCategory

StructElement.description: Unique client identifier. If there is an error during create, the client id in the ServiceData partial error list can be used to associate to the clientId in the input to detect which object creation failed.
StructElement.name: clientId

OperationTemplate.description: This operation retrieves the Licenses attached to the given workspace objects . In case of multiple objects, only the licenses that are attached to all of the objects will be returned . It also retrieves level or structure information in case of ActiveWorkspace Content context. In ActiveWorkspace Content context, if the selected object do not have additional child objects then level or structure information are not be returned.
OperationTemplate.name: Aut0::Soa::Security::AwLicensing::getLicensesWithTypes
OperationTemplate.returnDescription: The licenses attached to the given objects and the licenses that are available for attachment to those objects.

OperationParameter.description: Structure that holds the information required to get list of licenses.
OperationParameter.name: licenseInputs

OperationTemplate.description: This operation creates TC_Project business objects using the given input. The newly created project will be active and visible with the current login user as Project Administrator and Project Team Administrator.
OperationTemplate.name: Aut0::Soa::Security::AwProjectLevelSecurity::createProjects
OperationTemplate.returnDescription:
The newly created TC_Project business objects are returned in the ServiceData created objects list. If creation of one or more projects is not successful, partial errors are returned indicating why the project could not be created.

The following partial errors are returned:

* 101010: <projectId> ID already exists in the system. <projectId> ID must be unique within a site.
* 101002: The Project ID “<projectId>” is invalid.
* 101025: The entered Project name is either empty or contains blank spaces.
* 101026: The Project name <projectName> already exists. It must be unique within a site.
* 290013: Failed to check authorization.

OperationParameter.description: A list of CreateProjectInfo objects each of which define a TC_Project business object.
OperationParameter.name: createInfo

Operation.description: This operation retrieves the Licenses attached to the given workspace objects . In case of multiple objects, only the licenses that are attached to all of the objects will be returned . It also retrieves level or structure information in case of ActiveWorkspace Content context. In ActiveWorkspace Content context, if the selected object do not have additional child objects then level or structure information are not be returned.
Operation.name: getLicensesWithTypes
Operation.returnDescription: The licenses attached to the given objects and the licenses that are available for attachment to those objects.

ParameterInfo.description: Structure that holds the information required to get list of licenses.

Operation.description: This operation creates TC_Project business objects using the given input. The newly created project will be active and visible with the current login user as Project Administrator and Project Team Administrator.
Operation.name: createProjects
Operation.returnDescription:
The newly created TC_Project business objects are returned in the ServiceData created objects list. If creation of one or more projects is not successful, partial errors are returned indicating why the project could not be created.

The following partial errors are returned:

* 101010: <projectId> ID already exists in the system. <projectId> ID must be unique within a site.
* 101002: The Project ID “<projectId>” is invalid.
* 101025: The entered Project name is either empty or contains blank spaces.
* 101026: The Project name <projectName> already exists. It must be unique within a site.
* 290013: Failed to check authorization.

ParameterInfo.description: A list of CreateProjectInfo objects each of which define a TC_Project business object.

OperationInputProperty.description: Reference to a persistent ITAR License object.
Authorizing Paragraph that authorizes the attachment of this license to a Workspace Object

TcRuntimeType.description: Aut0ITARLicense is runtime business object that encapsulates ITAR_License. Aut0ITARLicense will be used to view the ead_paragraph entered during attachment of licenses to a workspace object. Aut0ITARLicense is used in Teamcenter Active Workspace.

TcProperty.description: Reference to a persistent ITAR License object.
Authorizing Paragraph that authorizes the attachment of this license to a Workspace Object

TcCompoundPropertyRule.description: Last Modified Date of the wrapped ITAR License.
Name of the wrapped ITAR License.
Type of the wrapper ITAR License. (In case of children of ITAR)
Owning User of the wrapped ITAR License.

Functionality.description: This component consists code that supports authorization functionalities in Active Workspace.
Functionality.name: Aut0Authorization

Condition.description: Server side command visibility condition for Attach License command. This command should be visible for Teamcenter Version >=11.2.4. This command should be visible only if selected object is of type WorkspaceObject, Dataset or Form. This command should not be visible if selected object is of type EPMTask or Signoff. This command should be visible if the logged in user is a member of dba group or is in the ITAR Admin or IP Admin role.
Condition.expression: ((u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o,"WorkspaceObject") = true OR u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Dataset") = true OR u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Form") = true) AND (u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "EPMTask") = false AND u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Signoff") = false) AND (u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsPlatformVersionAtLeast("11.2.4","11.2.4") = true) ) AND (u.group_name = "dba" OR u.role_name = "ITAR Admin" OR u.role_name = "IP Admin")
Condition.name: Aut0AttachLicensesCmdCond

Condition.description: Server side command visibility condition for Assign Projects command. This command should be visible for Teamcenter Version <=11.2.3. It should be visible only if selected object is of type WorkspaceObject, Dataset or Form. It should not be visible if selected object is of type EPMTask or Signoff. It should be visible if the logged in user is a member of dba group or is in the ITAR Admin or IP Admin role.
Condition.expression: ((u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o,"WorkspaceObject") = true OR u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Dataset") = true OR u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Form") = true) AND (u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "EPMTask") = false AND u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsObjectType(o, "Signoff") = false) ) AND ((u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsPlatformVersionSupported("11.2.0") = true) AND (u.fnd0ConditionHelper.awp0IsPlatformVersionSupported("11.2.4") = false)) AND (u.group_name = "dba" OR u.role_name = "ITAR Admin" OR u.role_name = "IP Admin")
Condition.name: Aut0AttachLicensesLegacyCmdCond

Condition.description: Server side command visibility condition for Add Project command. This command should be visible only if the user is logged in with privileged group or with Project Administration group and Project Administrator role.
Condition.name: Aut0AddProjectCmdCond

Library.description: Library for Active Workspace for authorization solution
Library.name: Aut0authorizationaws

TcRuntimeType.description: Provider to fetch the TC_Project objects

BusinessObjectInterface.description: Interface Name for Business Object Aut0ProjectProvider
BusinessObjectInterface.name: Aut0ProjectProvider

TcProperty.description: Returns true if the TC_project is modifiable by the current user.

TcExtension.description: Edit handler for TC_Project in active workspace.
TcExtension.name: Aut0TC_ProjectEditHandler
